sqlMap.insert: insert into sys_role_data( ID, CREATED, create_time, UPDATED, update_time, ROLE_ID, TABLE_NAME, USER_IDS, DEPT_IDS, STATUS) values( #id#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#, #roleId#, #tableName#, #userIds#, #deptIds#, #status#)
sqlMap.delete: update sys_role_data set status='0' where id=#id#
sqlMap.select: select id, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime, role_id as roleId, table_name as tableName, user_ids as userIds, dept_ids as deptIds, status from sys_role_data where id=#id#
sqlMap.update:
update sys_role_data
id=#id# created=#created#
create_time=#createTime#
updated=#updated#
update_time=#updateTime#
role_id=#roleId#
table_name=#tableName#
user_ids=#userIds#
dept_ids=#deptIds#
status=#status#
where id=#id#
sqlMap.select: select id, created, createTime, updated, updateTime, role_id as roleId, table_name as tableName, user_ids as userIds, dept_ids as deptIds, status from sys_role_data where status='1'
select id, created, createTime, updated, updateTime, role_id as roleId, table_name as tableName, user_ids as userIds, dept_ids as deptIds, status from sys_role_data where status='1'
select count(*) from sys_role_data where status='1'

select id, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime, role_id as roleId, table_name as tableName, user_ids as userIds, dept_ids as deptIds, status from sys_role_data where status='1' AND role_id=#roleId#
select count(*) from sys_role_data where status='1' and role_id=#roleId#
